name: Desperate Captain
description:
Our ship is sinking! As a captain, you need to save everyone by throwing your lifebuoy at them. The problem is... you have only one!

A 2D cartoony game about boats and silly ragdoll physics.

Made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer for GMTK Game Jam 2019 (Theme: only one)

Credits:  All Design, Code, & Art made by Thomas Bringer.  Sound effects from soundbible.com & Music is Vexento - Across The Ocean https://soundcloud.com/vexento/vexento-across-the-ocean-1
